main.name: Main Product Builder
main.description: Orchestrates UI feature development, coordinates subagents, integrates components

ui_builder.name: UI Component Builder
ui_builder.description: Creates visually stunning, responsive React components
ui_builder.role: Specializes in shadcn/ui components, Tailwind CSS, component structure
constraints: No API calls or backend logic
Focus on visual rendering and component APIs
Implement all component variants and states

integration_expert.name: Integration & Data Layer
integration_expert.description: Builds API integrations, hooks, and state management
integration_expert.role: Handles fetch logic, TanStack Query, custom hooks, error handling
constraints: Provide TypeScript types for all API responses
Use TanStack Query for server state

form_specialist.name: Form & Validation Expert
form_specialist.description: Builds complex forms with validation and submission logic
form_specialist.role: React Hook Form, Zod schemas, form interactions, user feedback
constraints: All forms must have Zod validation schemas

animation_specialist.name: Motion & Animation Expert
animation_specialist.description: Creates smooth, performant animations and transitions
animation_specialist.role: Framer Motion, micro-interactions, motion design, accessibility
success_criteria: Code uses Framer Motion best practices

a11y_auditor.name: Accessibility Auditor
a11y_auditor.description: Reviews components for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
a11y_auditor.role: ARIA attributes, semantic HTML, keyboard nav, contrast ratios, focus management

performance_optimizer.name: Performance Optimizer
performance_optimizer.description: Ensures fast page loads and smooth interactions
performance_optimizer.role: Code splitting, image optimization, lazy loading, bundle analysis

steps.prompt: Use Plan Mode to break down requirements into component, hook, and form tasks
@ui_builder: Create components based on plan. Use shadcn/ui, responsive design, all states.
@integration-expert: Create hooks for data fetching, caching, error handling.
@form-specialist: Create forms with React Hook Form, Zod validation, user feedback.
@animation-specialist: Add entrance, hover, and exit animations. Test performance.
@a11y-auditor: Review all components. Check WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Report issues.
Integrate all components, test in browser, verify responsive design, commit.
I'm pasting a design mockup. Analyze the layout, components, colors, typography. Suggest React component structure.
@ui_builder: Convert the design into React components using shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS. Match colors, spacing, typography exactly.
Use the visual editor to compare generated code with design mockup. Adjust spacing, colors as needed.
@integration-expert: Add data fetching hooks. Connect component props to API data.
Screenshot the component or describe issues. Ask for specific fixes.
@ui_builder: Fix the specific styling/layout issue mentioned. Test responsive design.
@a11y-auditor: Re-audit after changes. Ensure no regressions.
Screenshot and compare. If good, commit. If not, iterate.

new_component.prompt: Create a new shadcn/ui-based component called {name} that {description}. Use the canonical structure from @frontend-stack.mdc. Include all props, TypeScript types, responsive variants, and dark mode support. Make sure Tailwind classes are optimized.

new_hook.prompt: @integration-expert: Create a custom React hook called use{Name} that {description}. Use TanStack Query for data fetching if applicable. Handle loading, error, and success states. Return properly typed data.

new_form.prompt: @form-specialist: Build a form component called {name} that {description}. Include React Hook Form, Zod validation schema, error messages, loading state, and success/error toast notifications.

audit_a11y.prompt: @a11y-auditor: Review {component_path} for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Check ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, color contrast (4.5:1), focus management, and semantic HTML. Provide a report with specific fixes needed.

animate_component.prompt: @animation-specialist: Add smooth animations to {component_path}. Include entrance (fade in + slide), hover effects, and exit animations. Keep animations < 300ms. Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Use Framer Motion.

design_to_code.prompt: I'm pasting a design mockup below. Analyze it and suggest React component structure, Tailwind layout, shadcn/ui components, colors, and spacing. Then generate production-ready code using @ui_builder.

optimize_responsive.prompt: Test {component_path} on mobile, tablet, and desktop. Use Cursor's visual editor with responsive mode. Fix any layout issues. Verify Tailwind breakpoints (sm, md, lg, xl) work correctly.

context_window_management.strategy: Start new chats for complex features, keep related tasks in same chat

web.purpose: Research current best practices, library documentation

cursor-ide-browser.purpose: Browser automation and testing for frontend/webapp development

cursor-browser-extension.purpose: Browser navigation and interaction for frontend/webapp development and testing
